docs.lead_paragraph: THE sculptured portrait of a baby by Paul Manship in the Spring Academy has a tremendous resonance. No physiognomy hacked and hewn into expressive shape by the experiences of a long life could have been made to convey more eloquently its character.

headline.main: ART AT HOME AND ABROAD; Striking Portrait of a Baby. French Drawings and Anglo Irish Paintings on View. Decorative Pictures for Summer Homes.

docs.snippet: THE sculptured portrait of a baby by Paul Manship in the Spring Academy has a tremendous resonance. No physiognomy hacked and hewn into expressive shape by the experiences of a long life could have been made to convey more eloquently its character.
